sentences.en: An admirable people wrests a living from the reluctant soil and the merciless seas.
sentences.cn: 可敬可佩的人们从贫瘠的土地和严酷的大海谋求生计.

sentences.en: But the nature of the world is merciless change.
sentences.cn: 但这世界的性质是无情的变革.

sentences.en: I saw merciless anger in her eyes.
I will not be looked at under this merciless glare.
sentences.cn: 我可不想在这么耀眼的.光线下面见人.

sentences.en: It all happens with the implacable symmetry and merciless banality of life.
sentences.cn: 一切的发生都伴随着生活那无法改变的匀称和残忍的平庸.

sentences.en: It was typical of him to be so merciless.
sentences.cn: 只有他才会这么冷酷无情.

sentences.en: Mother and daughter or no, respectable or no, the need for money was merciless.
sentences.cn: 什么母女不母女, 什么体面不体面, 钱是无情的.

sentences.en: The killer was merciless. He killed the miller with a metallic rod.
sentences.cn: 凶手很残忍, 用一根金属棒将磨房主杀害.

sentences.en: They are merciless, with hearts as hard as nails.
sentences.cn: 他们冷酷无情, 铁石心肠.

sentences.en: This judge is merciless towards anyone found guilty of murder.
sentences.cn: 这位法官对罪名成立的谋杀犯概不留情.

sentences.en: To Heaven, that has alone delivered us from the grasp of so merciless an enemy.
sentences.cn: 感谢老天爷, 全靠他把我们从这样凶恶的敌人魔爪下解救出来.

sentences.en: Washes the bitter sea, the merciless surge of the ocean!
sentences.cn: 都冲进苦涩的海水, 这无情的海浪!
和以往一样，惠斯勒还是那么冷酷无情。

words.tran_cn: 仁慈，宽容；怜悯；幸运；善行

trans.tran_cn: 残忍的，无怜悯之心的，蛇蝎心肠，无情
trans.tran_en: cruel and showing no kindness or forgiveness
